title: Ignoramus a comedy as it was several times acted with extraordinary applause before the Majesty of King James : with a supplement which, out of respect to the students of the common law, was hitherto wanting / written in Latine by R. Ruggles ... ; and translated into English by R. C. ...
author: Ruggle, George, 1575-1622.
notes: Published 1678 with title: The English lawyer.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
